title: Biden VP Pick, DNC Chair Tom Perez, Jobs
itunes:title: Biden VP Pick, DNC Chair Tom Perez, Jobs
description:
Guests: Brandon Neal, Democratic strategist, former deputy chief of staff and political advisor to Rep. Karen Bass, and senior advisor to Pete Buttigieg’s Presidential Campaign, Amos Snead, Executive Vice President at ADFERO, DNC Chairman Tom Perez, Alex Ebert, Bloomberg Law reporter, and Mattie Duppler, Founder of Forward Strategies, and Senior Fellow at the National Taxpayers Union.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
